title: Trusting Her Hero
description: ğ‡ğ'ğ¬ ğ­ğ¡ğğ«ğ ğ­ğ¨ ğ¬ğšğ¯ğ ğ­ğ¡ğ ğ­ğ¨ğ°ğ§. ğğ®ğ­ ğœğšğ§ ğ¡ğ ğšğ¥ğ¬ğ¨ ğ©ğ«ğ¨ğ­ğğœğ­ ğ¡ğğ«?Detective Wilder Coleman left Fisher Springs ten years ago a shattered man thanks to his ex, Kate. Now he's back, undercover, to find the man that wants to blow up the town.Except the real bomb is the one dropped on him when he learns the truth of what really happened that night.Kate Loprete's business is on the cusp of taking off. But her world is thrown upside down when her ex, Wilder, returns to town.He's returned under questionable circumstances and she's not sure if she can trust him.When the truth comes out, it threatens to destroy everything she's worked so hard to build.Now Wilder wants a second chance to make things right.
author: Danielle Pays
